Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.marceloleite2604.util.file.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends Object
    A series of handy methods which helps working with files.

      • retrieveFileSizeFormattedAsText

        public String retrieveFileSizeFormattedAsText(String filePath)
        Retrieved the size of a file formatted as text.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path to the file which the size must be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A text informing the file size using the most considerable size unit (kB, MB, GB, etc.).

      • appendSeparatorIfNecessary

        public String appendSeparatorIfNecessary(String text)
        Appends the File.separator a the text if it does not have it already.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to append the File.separator
        Returns:
        The content of the text parameter, plus the File.separator character appended if it does not have it already.
